xwikidoc.title: Java test: Choose
xwikidoc.content:
{{info}}**Question:** Which of the following is true:
1. In java, an instance field declared public generates a compilation error. 1. ##int## is the name of a class available in the package ##java.lang##. 1. Instance variable names may only contain letters and digits. 1. A class always has a constructor (possibly automatically supplied by the java compiler). 1. The more comments in a program, the faster the program runs. {{/info}}
